Dec. 3, 1978 D Aylesbury (Buckinghamshire & District BBA) Contest (Youth Section)
Aylesbury (Buckinghamshire & District BBA) Contest (Section B) 20 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Aylesbury Contest (Bucks BBA) aylesbury-buck-district-bba-section-b
Entertainments Contest with Deportment Mark
Aylesbury, Buckinghamshire, England, UK British Bandsman 30/12/1978 gives the above total points and placings. The Jubilee Brass remark sheet states simply "Music 130, Entertainment 65: Total 195", and bears the annotation "2nd". We deduce that there was probably a 20 point penalty applied (perhaps for time?). If you have more detail, please let us know.
Feb. 2, 2013, 10:33 a.m. Sept. 21, 2013, 7:02 p.m.
1 Kennington (Oxford) Ron Sudworth
2 Olney Brass Malcolm Holloway
2 Kidlington Silver David Martin
4 Jubilee Brass (Oxford) Ken Membury
